00022 #include <GisCommon.h>

00024 /// \cond DOXYGEN-IGNORE
00025 // This class is not yet exposed to the API.
00026 // It provides streamed I/O against a simple array of bytes.
00027 class GisIoBufferStream :
00028     public GisIoStream
00029 {
00030 public:
00031     /// Creates a stream around the given buffer. 
00032     static GisIoBufferStream* Create( GisByte* buffer, GisSize size );
00033     /// Creates a new buffer of the given size and wraps a stream around it. 
00034     static GisIoBufferStream* Create( GisSize size );
00035 
00036     /// GisIoStream implementations
00037     virtual GisSize Read( GisByte* buffer, GisSize count );
00038     virtual void Write( GisByte* buffer, GisSize count );
00039     virtual void Write( GisIoStream* stream, GisSize count = 0 );
00040     virtual void SetLength( GisInt64 length );
00041 
00042     virtual GisInt64 GetLength() {
00043         return( mLength);
00044     }
00045 
00046     virtual GisInt64 GetIndex()
00047     {
00048         return mPos;
00049     }
00050 
00051     virtual void Skip( GisInt64 offset );
00052     virtual void Reset();
00053 
00054 protected:
00055     GisIoBufferStream( GisByte* buffer, GisSize size );
00056     GisIoBufferStream( GisSize size = 4096 );
00057     virtual ~GisIoBufferStream(void);
00058 
00059 private:
00060     /// the buffer.
00061     GisByte* mpBuffer;
00062     /// true if the buffer was allocated by this stream.
00063     /// false if the stream is attached to an existing buffer.
00064     GisBoolean mbMyBuffer;
00065     /// Total size of the buffer
00066     GisSize mSize;
00067     /// Total length of the stream
00068     GisSize mLength;
00069     /// Current stream position.
00070     GisSize mPos;
00071 
00072 };
00073 
00074 typedef GisPtr<GisIoBufferStream> GisIoBufferStreamP;
00075 /// \endcond

00077 #endif
